text: 🚨Ukraine War Updates: Kremlin silent on Iran's attack warning; Russians near battlefield target🚨🇺🇸Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen urges House to pass Ukraine aid bill, says there's "no substitute" for US support. 💰🇺🇦🤔But what about the legal debate surrounding the use of funds? 🏢👀💭Yellen believes risks are manageable, especially with a united G7 front. 🌟🇬🇧🔍Stay informed, stay vigilant! 📰👀
